title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Lifetime Skills Guarantee
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 12 May 2021.
content:
The Government’s skills promises are inconsistent and illogical, shutting out sectors where we already have a skills shortage.
